definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: Primary and secondary school will impart to you only some rudiments of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 由小學到中學，所修習的無非是一些普通的基本知識。

sentences.english: Eventually the monster agreed to follow the Five Training Steps.
sentences.chinese: 直到這個大怪物終於願意修習五學處了。

sentences.english: Students then write up the results of their experiments, as described in the two writing assignments below.
sentences.chinese: 之後修習生需寫出實驗結果與下面兩個作業，並繳交。

sentences.english: The aspirant must channel the fire, an unwavering commitment of intent.
sentences.chinese: 修習者需導引內力，亦即對決心毫不動搖的承諾。

sentences.english: Hatha Yogis consider the body as the vehicle for the soul.
sentences.chinese: 哈達瑜伽修習者認爲身體是心靈的承載工具。

sentences.english: I want to shake up and warn all of you that developing insight has many obstacles.
sentences.chinese: 我要提醒並警告你們，修習內觀會有許多障礙。

sentences.english: It would be a wonderful practice to adopt.
sentences.chinese: 能依此軌來修習是非常好的。

sentences.english: If not uphold the precepts, vertical attend contribution has also demons heretics.
sentences.chinese: 若不持戒律，縱修習有成，亦是天魔外道。

sentences.english: A1:4-year students must attend three semesters of P. E class.
sentences.chinese: 日間部四技學生必須修習四學期體育課程。

sentences.english: He told them that practising the Five Training Steps is necessary to purify the mind.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴他們淨化心靈就要修習五學處。

sentences.english: You can do it for yourself also.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以爲對自己做此修習。

sentences.english: You always practiced what you preached.
Please set up the mind to listen, and bring it into practice.
sentences.chinese: 現在就請你們定下心來聽，並且去實際修習。

sentences.english: Teachers shall encourage students to take courses in fields that are not traditionally affiliated with their gender.
sentences.chinese: 教師應鼓勵學生修習非傳統性別之學科領域。

sentences.english: Common people are different, they have no their own principle of practice, and their practice in soundness, tranquilness and peace are not enough.
sentences.chinese: 修行完備的人，在個人的修習上是堅定不移的。

sentences.english: Therefore, hatha yoga says that the shatkarmas must be practiced first.
sentences.chinese: 正因爲如此，哈他瑜伽說首先要修習的是清潔術。

definition: to forge ahead vigorously/to dedicate oneself to progress
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
shadowboxing or Taiji, T'aichi or T'aichichuan/traditional form of physical exercise or relaxation/a martial art
gate to enlightment (Buddhism)/Buddhism/way/method/(old) south gate of a palace
(of Taoists) to practice austerities/to practice asceticism
Taoist or Buddhist rite/abbr. for 菩提道場|菩提道场[Pu2 ti2 dao4 chang3]
